channel.title: Luminous || Basic PI
channel.description:
[LEFT][IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/5093/86775726.png[/img][/LEFT]
[CENTER][size=10pt][B]About[/B][/SIZE] Luminous is a project I am working on from, [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/418249-cleaning-pi-v-1-0-a.html"]A Clean PI.[/URL] I am trying to recreate the days back in 2007/2008.
[IMG]http://kjth2003.files.wordpress.com/2007/11/98-firemaking.png[/img]
Thank you deathfire138 For the Picture
[B][size=10pt]Features[/size][/B] [code] By 3Oh!3 ~V 1.0: -total time put into base: 6 hours *Fixed a dupe *Majorly cleaned the source *Fixed 700 Eclipse errors *Enhanced mining & woodcutting *Cleaned out a good bit of process() in client.java *Implemented Cycle Events *Fixed about 3 major exploits [/code]
[code] Quicker Switching - Proof @ bottom Hourly Reward system Rewrote Fishing to allow more area's then what was there before Commands that are useful for Admins/Mods/Players and not abusive Childish ones Dual Arena [/code]
[code] Better PvP System Random Event with proper Randomness not Timer Anti Botting system (since peoples life's have come to botting on a RSPS) Proper Castle Wars, Clan Wars More will come with time :penguin: [/code]
[IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/382/c7b704eb92594880a2bc689.png[/img] [IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/8929/4b7ced64c0194fdc98a4c61.png[/img]
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/20fdees/6]Quick Switching[/URL]
I am looking for one other person to help out with GUI's, as I do not understand them as much, Contact me Via Skype: SilesX
[LEFT][size=10pt][B]Credits: Sanity 3oh!3[/B][/size][/LEFT] [/CENTER]

item.title: Luminous || Basic PI
item.dc:creator: @SilesX SilesX
item.description:
@SilesX wrote:

[LEFT][/LEFT]

[CENTER][size=10pt]About[/SIZE]
Luminous is a project I am working on from, A Clean PI. I am trying to recreate the days back in 2007/2008.

98-firemaking.png768×505

Thank you deathfire138 For the Picture

[size=10pt]Features[/size]

By 3Oh!3
~V 1.0:
-total time put into base: 6 hours
*Fixed a dupe
*Majorly cleaned the source
*Fixed 700 Eclipse errors
*Enhanced mining & woodcutting
*Cleaned out a good bit of process() in client.java
*Implemented Cycle Events
*Fixed about 3 major exploits
Quicker Switching - Proof @ bottom
Hourly Reward system
Rewrote Fishing to allow more area's then what was there before
Commands that are useful for Admins/Mods/Players and not abusive Childish ones
Dual Arena
Better PvP System
Random Event with proper Randomness not Timer
Anti Botting system (since peoples life's have come to botting on a RSPS)
Proper  Castle Wars, Clan Wars
More will come with time :penguin:


Quick Switching

I am looking for one other person to help out with GUI’s, as I do not understand them as much,
Contact me Via Skype: SilesX

[LEFT][size=10pt]Credits:
Sanity
3oh!3[/size][/LEFT]
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
